installCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl git unzip xz-utils zip libglu1-mesa && git config --global --add safe.directory '*' && curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.32.7-stable.tar.xz -o flutter.tar.xz && tar xf flutter.tar.xz && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter --version && flutter pub get
buildCommand: export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter build web --release --web-renderer html
